remarks: Definition of function like ~ dffun4 but using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 17-Mar-2019.)
statement:
dffun4f.1 $e |- F/_ x A $.
dffun4f.2 $e |- F/_ y A $.
dffun4f.3 $e |- F/_ z A $.
dffun4f $p |- ( Fun A <-> ( Rel A /\ A. x A. y A. z ( ( <. x , y >. e. A /\ <. x , z >. e. A ) -> y = z ) ) ) $.
$d x y z $.
